verses.verse: Now it came to pass, when Adonizedek <WH139> king <WH4428> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> had heard <WH8085> <WH8800> how <WH3588> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> had taken <WH3920> <WH8804> Ai <WH5857>, and had utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> it; as he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Yericho <WH3405> and her king <WH4428>, so he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Ai <WH5857> and her king <WH4428>; and how the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Giv`on <WH1391> had made peace <WH7999> <WH8689> with Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and were among <WH7130> them;

That they feared <WH3372> <WH8799> greatly <WH3966>, because Giv`on <WH1391> was a great <WH1419> city <WH5892>, as one <WH259> of the royal <WH4467> cities <WH5892>, and because it was greater <WH1419> than Ai <WH5857>, and all the men <WH582> thereof were mighty <WH1368>.

Wherefore Adonizedek <WH139> king <WH4428> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> unto Hoham <WH1944> king <WH4428> of Hevron <WH2275>, and unto Piram <WH6502> king <WH4428> of Jarmuth <WH3412>, and unto Japhia <WH3309> king <WH4428> of Lachish <WH3923>, and unto Debir <WH1688> king <WH4428> of Eglon <WH5700>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> unto me, and help <WH5826> <WH8798> me, that we may smite <WH5221> <WH8686> Giv`on <WH1391>: for it hath made peace <WH7999> <WH8689> with Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> and with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Therefore the five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, the king <WH4428> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, the king <WH4428> of Hevron <WH2275>, the king <WH4428> of Jarmuth <WH3412>, the king <WH4428> of Lachish <WH3923>, the king <WH4428> of Eglon <WH5700>, gathered themselves together <WH622> <WH8735>, and went up <WH5927> <WH8799>, they and all their hosts <WH4264>, and encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> before Giv`on <WH1391>, and made war <WH3898> <WH8735> against it.

And the men <WH582> of Giv`on <WH1391> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> to the camp <WH4264> to Gilgal <WH1537>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Slack <WH7503> <WH8686> not thy hand <WH3027> from thy servants <WH5650>; come up <WH5927> <WH8798> to us quickly <WH4120>, and save <WH3467> <WH8685> us, and help <WH5826> <WH8798> us: for all the kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the mountains <WH2022> are gathered together <WH6908> <WH8738> against us.
So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> ascended <WH5927> <WH8799> from Gilgal <WH1537>, he, and all the people <WH5971> of war <WH4421> with him, and all the mighty <WH1368> men of valour <WH2428>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> them not: for I have delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> them into thine hand <WH3027>; there shall not a man <WH376> of them stand <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee.
Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> therefore came <WH935> <WH8799> unto them suddenly <WH6597>, and went up <WH5927> <WH8804> from Gilgal <WH1537> all night <WH3915>.

And the YY <WH3068> discomfited <WH2000> <WH8799> them before <WH6440> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and slew <WH5221> <WH8686> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347> at Giv`on <WH1391>, and chased <WH7291> <WH8799> them along the way <WH1870> that goeth up <WH4608> to Bethhoron <WH1032>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them to Azekah <WH5825>, and unto Makkedah <WH4719>.

And it came to pass, as they fled <WH5127> <WH8800> from before <WH6440> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and were in the going down <WH4174> to Bethhoron <WH1032>, that the YY <WH3068> cast down <WH7993> <WH8689> great <WH1419> stones <WH68> from heaven <WH8064> upon them unto Azekah <WH5825>, and they died <WH4191> <WH8799>: they were more <WH7227> which died <WH4191> <WH8804> with hailstones <WH1259> <WH68> than they whom <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> slew <WH2026> <WH8804> with the sword <WH2719>.

Then spake <WH1696> <WH8762> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> to the YY <WH3068> in the day <WH3117> when the YY <WH3068> delivered up <WH5414> <WH8800> the Amorites <WH567> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and he said <WH559> <WH8799> in the sight <WH5869> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Sun <WH8121>, stand thou still <WH1826> <WH8798> upon Giv`on <WH1391>; and thou, Moon <WH3394>, in the valley <WH6010> of Ajalon <WH357>.

And the sun <WH8121> stood still <WH1826> <WH8799>, and the moon <WH3394> stayed <WH5975> <WH8804>, until the people <WH1471> had avenged <WH5358> <WH8799> themselves upon their enemies <WH341> <WH8802>. Is not this <WH1931> written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612> of Jasher <WH3477>? So the sun <WH8121> stood still <WH5975> <WH8799> in the midst <WH2677> of heaven <WH8064>, and hasted <WH213> <WH8804> not to go down <WH935> <WH8800> about a whole <WH8549> day <WH3117>.

And there was no day <WH3117> like that before <WH6440> it or after <WH310> it, that the YY <WH3068> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8800> unto the voice <WH6963> of a man <WH376>: for the YY <WH3068> fought <WH3898> <WH8737> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> returned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, unto the camp <WH4264> to Gilgal <WH1537>.
But these five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> fled <WH5127> <WH8799>, and hid <WH2244> <WH8735> themselves in a cave <WH4631> at Makkedah <WH4719>.

And it was told <WH5046> <WH8714> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> are found <WH4672> <WH8738> hid <WH2244> <WH8737> in a cave <WH4631> at Makkedah <WH4719>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Roll <WH1556> <WH8798> great <WH1419> stones <WH68> upon the mouth <WH6310> of the cave <WH4631>, and set <WH6485> <WH8685> men <WH582> by it for to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> them:

And stay <WH5975> <WH8799> ye not, but pursue <WH7291> <WH8798> after <WH310> your enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and smite the hindmost <WH2179> <WH8765> of them; suffer <WH5414> <WH8799> them not to enter <WH935> <WH8800> into their cities <WH5892>: for the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> them into your hand <WH3027>.

And it came to pass, when Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> had made an end <WH3615> <WH8763> of slaying <WH5221> <WH8687> them with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>, till they were consumed <WH8552> <WH8800>, that the rest <WH8300> which remained <WH8277> <WH8804> of them entered <WH935> <WH8799> into fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892>.

And all the people <WH5971> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> to the camp <WH4264> to Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> at Makkedah <WH4719> in peace <WH7965>: none moved <WH2782> <WH8804> his tongue <WH3956> against any <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, Open <WH6605> <WH8798> the mouth <WH6310> of the cave <WH4631>, and bring out <WH3318> <WH8685> those five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> unto me out of the cave <WH4631>.

And they did <WH6213> <WH8799> so, and brought forth <WH3318> <WH8686> those five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> unto him out of the cave <WH4631>, the king <WH4428> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, the king <WH4428> of Hevron <WH2275>, the king <WH4428> of Jarmuth <WH3412>, the king <WH4428> of Lachish <WH3923>, and the king <WH4428> of Eglon <WH5700>.

And it came to pass, when they brought out <WH3318> <WH8687> those kings <WH4428> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, that Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the captains <WH7101> of the men <WH582> of war <WH4421> which went <WH1980> <WH8804> with him, Come near <WH7126> <WH8798>, put <WH7760> <WH8798> your feet <WH7272> upon the necks <WH6677> of these kings <WH4428>. And they came near <WH7126> <WH8799>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> their feet <WH7272> upon the necks <WH6677> of them.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, nor be dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735>, be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of good courage <WH553> <WH8798>: for thus shall the YY <WH3068> do <WH6213> <WH8799> to all your enemies <WH341> <WH8802> against whom ye fight <WH3898> <WH8737>.

And afterward <WH310> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them, and slew <WH4191> <WH8686> them, and hanged <WH8518> <WH8799> them on five <WH2568> trees <WH6086>: and they were hanging <WH8518> <WH8803> upon the trees <WH6086> until the evening <WH6153>.

And it came to pass at the time <WH6256> of the going down <WH935> <WH8800> of the sun <WH8121>, that Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>, and they took them down <WH3381> <WH8686> off the trees <WH6086>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> them into the cave <WH4631> wherein they had been hid <WH2244> <WH8738>, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> great <WH1419> stones <WH68> in the cave's <WH4631> mouth <WH6310>, which remain until this very <WH6106> day <WH3117>.

And that day <WH3117> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> took <WH3920> <WH8804> Makkedah <WH4719>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and the king <WH4428> thereof he utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8689>, them, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein; he let <WH7604> <WH8689> none remain <WH8300>: and he did <WH6213> <WH8799> to the king <WH4428> of Makkedah <WH4719> as he did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto the king <WH4428> of Yericho <WH3405>.
Then Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> passed <WH5674> <WH8799> from Makkedah <WH4719>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, unto Libnah <WH3841>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Libnah <WH3841>:

And the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> it also, and the king <WH4428> thereof, into the hand <WH3027> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein; he let <WH7604> <WH8689> none remain <WH8300> in it; but did <WH6213> <WH8799> unto the king <WH4428> thereof as he did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto the king <WH4428> of Yericho <WH3405>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> passed <WH5674> <WH8799> from Libnah <WH3841>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, unto Lachish <WH3923>, and encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> against it, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against it:

And the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> Lachish <WH3923> into the hand <WH3027> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which took <WH3920> <WH8799> it on the second <WH8145> day <WH3117>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein, according to all that he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Libnah <WH3841>.

Then Horam <WH2036> king <WH4428> of Gezer <WH1507> came up <WH5927> <WH8804> to help <WH5826> <WH8800> Lachish <WH3923>; and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> him and his people <WH5971>, until he had left <WH7604> <WH8689> him none remaining <WH8300>.

And from Lachish <WH3923> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> passed <WH5674> <WH8799> unto Eglon <WH5700>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him; and they encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> against it, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against it:

And they took <WH3920> <WH8799> it on that day <WH3117>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein he utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8689> that day <WH3117>, according to all that he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Lachish <WH3923>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from Eglon <WH5700>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, unto Hevron <WH2275>; and they fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against it:

And they took <WH3920> <WH8799> it, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and the king <WH4428> thereof, and all the cities <WH5892> thereof, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein; he left <WH7604> <WH8689> none remaining <WH8300>, according to all that he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Eglon <WH5700>; but destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> it utterly, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> returned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, to Debir <WH1688>; and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against it:

And he took <WH3920> <WH8799> it, and the king <WH4428> thereof, and all the cities <WH5892> thereof; and they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> all the souls <WH5315> that were therein; he left <WH7604> <WH8689> none remaining <WH8300>: as he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> to Hevron <WH2275>, so he did <WH6213> <WH8804> to Debir <WH1688>, and to the king <WH4428> thereof; as he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> also to Libnah <WH3841>, and to her king <WH4428>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> all the country <WH776> of the hills <WH2022>, and of the south <WH5045>, and of the vale <WH8219>, and of the springs <WH794>, and all their kings <WH4428>: he left <WH7604> <WH8689> none remaining <WH8300>, but utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8689> all that breathed <WH5397>, as the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them from Kadeshbarnea <WH6947> even unto Gaza <WH5804>, and all the country <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>, even unto Giv`on <WH1391>.

And all these kings <WH4428> and their land <WH776> did Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> take <WH3920> <WH8804> at one <WH259> time <WH6471>, because the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> fought <WH3898> <WH8737> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> returned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, unto the camp <WH4264> to Gilgal <WH1537>.
